scripts.start: echo Starting ShadowLink... && echo Backend will run on port 3000 && echo Frontend will run on port 3000
scripts.dev: echo Run backend: cd backend && node server.js && echo Run frontend: cd frontend && npm start
scripts.restart: echo Stopping all servers... && powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" && echo Starting backend... && start cmd /c "cd backend && node server.js" && echo Starting frontend... && start cmd /c "cd frontend && npm start"
